description.lang: Use this sleek and efficient motion sensor in your DIY security system or for added convenience. Trigger Z-Wave light switches when motion is detected. Receive notifications of unexpected activity while you are away.Install and add the sensor to your Z-Wave controller in minutes. Enjoy Z-Wave Plus for faster and safer wireless communication. Choose from 2 powers sources: standard AAA batteries or micro USB power adapter.Detection Radius: 110 / 16-23 feet Power: DC 5V/1A or 4 AAA (1.2V) batteries Power Consumption: < 15mA when idle / < 38mA when active Range: Up to 100 feet line of sight Operating Temperature: 14 F to 122 F Operating Humidity:80% Installation and Use: Indoor only
